name: Carol Woods
text: This was my first time going to this store and they truly have the most sweetest spirits! The Atmosphere was calm and peaceful and they truly took the time to assist my children and myself to make sure we were completely satisfied! We Will most definitely be going back !

name: Wendy Toledo
text: Awesome and sad at the same time. My family will miss this place.

name: Ralphy mguilacutty
text: Great selection, including high end saddles.  Excellent customer service too!  Friendly.

name: Julia Bonner
text: Great store with a wide selection of cactus and classic ropes!

text: Purchased a cowboy hat for my son.  Nice selection and gentleman working that morning was very nice & helpful.

text: Ready to buy and your store is closed when your hours say you are open.  Bad business.  I'll just go to another business in Alabaster.  Good thing I saw the other reviews as well.

text: We got great help. Maybe you just have to go at a certain time

text: Said they open at 10. Nobody was there till 1140.. Had no boots in the size I needed which is a very common size. Waited all that time for them to not have anything in stock.

name: Lan Hoang
text: Walked in with 1500 to spend and walked out buying nada. We were ignored by the three sales people in an empty store on a wednesday afternoon.

name: Hog Tide
text: It was Walmart. Overcrowded and no cashier's

name: Jacob Blackstock Sr.
text: They say their going out of business but until they do this is the best place to pick up you western apparel. The owners are super nice and helpful. Will definitely be trying to make a trip back before they do officially close.

name: Carmel Thomas
text: I  luv there variety  of fat baby boots, women can walk for hours an no sore feet. Get round toes.different kind of wanglers jeans. Low rise in front an high in the back

name: Bert Sides
text: Love Cowboy Way, will miss u girls..RIP James!😔

name: Johnny Herron
text: Always excellent.   I bought alot of stuff from them . From hats clothing and boots.and belts

name: Jay Blackwell
text: Good selection of western wear , a little pricey , friendly personal.

name: Chazz z
text: Really great people, lot of name brands and unique items.

name: Jonathan Bevill
text: Great clothing and boot store and the ladies are great that attend to you.

name: TIM BO
text: I been buying from this store for over 15 years. I bought a pair of boots on 3.5.18 within 3 weeks they starting to split open where they was glued together at and the insoles is falling apart. I contacted cowboyway they said bring them in we will replace them I brought them back in the owners wasnt in it was on a Saturday and said they wouldnt be back until Tuesday so I left my boots with them and my phone number and on Monday I received a fb message saying its normal for the boots to come apart its where they are put together and its normal so Justin boots will not make the boots up. I called Justin and found out that its Not normal and it is a defect. Cowboy way lied to me. The Justin worker was upset that I was told its normal for their boots to split open after a few weeks of wearing them. Justin is making the boots up for me so thank you JUSTIN BOOTS. you are great ... I will not go back to cowboy way.

name: Mario Garcia
text: I went there last weekend and they have the best prices

name: Ray Lee
text: A country boy and girls favorite place

name: Stacy Smith
text: Love shopping here

name: Jeremy Mccarter
text: Great place,

name: Reginald Chatman
text: Great Great place to get the things you need while traveling

name: Dillian Hilyer
text: Great prices on trailers! Super friendly staff!

name: Donnie Pruitt
text: Great selection of western hats and accessories. Also custom order utility trailers and parts. Very friendly and helpful staff. Highly recommended!!

name: Arbadella Ankermiller
text: Great place to buy hats

name: Jana Deaton
text: Exceptional staff!  They were so friendly and helpful. They have an amazing selection. They were knowledgeable and prices were within reason.

name: Landry Hill
text: Such sweet people! They were a huge help when it came to picking out boots! 100% satisfied!

name: Michael Sturdevant
text: This is one of my favorite places to shop. The people are wonderful. You tell them what you want and they find it for you. If they don't have the item they will order for you to either ship it to you or you can pick it up at their store. I recommend this place highly.

name: Jacob Andrew Russell
text: That was the best shoewear collection in the state. It was so good in fact I told many people about it.

name: Wade Baker
text:
Went in to just browse their selection. Was just thinking about some new boots, and ladies were so helpful, and thoughtful, that I left with 2 pair!! Great salesmanship!! Lol!!
Great selection, and fair prices too. Would definitely recommend.

name: Zen Traveler
text: Wall to wall western gear, and then some. Great and friendly customer service. Handsome collection of hats, boots and belts. It’s almost overwhelming the quality selection available.

name: DeWayne Crumly
text: Wonderful people and they really put the customers first!

name: Shane Gilliland
text: Great people to do business with!

name: Curtis Carroll
text: The owners were FANTASTIC.  You could not ask for better people to wait on you for new boots.

name: Andrew McAlister
text: One of the best western stores around will always continue to get boots from this store the employees went above and beyond to make sure I left satisfied and they were super friendly!

name: Andrew Coward
text: Very knowledgeable and friendly staff. I was greeted with smiles and friendly faces the second I walked through the door. They have everything you need, and everything you'd want for western wear. My first visit just made me loyal customer.

name: Brittney Roccato
text: Very friendly and I love that they have layaway great for holiday shopping.

name: Mike Boston
text: When it comes to outfitting all the cowboys and cowgirls around your bunkhouse Happy Trails has it all. Boots, belts, hats, shirts and jeans. The people there know their stuff when it comes to helping you find just the right style of western wear your looking for. They have been in the same location for 29 years, so they must be doing something right. Stop by and say howdee.

name: Barry Cox
text: Great service and a huge selection of all things boots

name: Kymbree Daniel
text: There workers are really friendly and will help you with anything I now rate this as my #1 western store.  They have anything and everything.

name: Josh Palmore
text: This store is awesome! 100% truthful, no b.s. They are my #1 boot store

name: Christopher Mims
text: Really nice stuff. From work to casual to office. Great knowledgeable staff.

name: James Meyers
text: Finally! A western store that had most everything I was looking for. First-time visit from Wisconsin and we don't have a lot of western stores up here anymore.

name: johnny Jr gezelman
text: Wonderful place friendly staff very helpful

name: Cory Smith
text: Terrible customer service!!! On two seperate occasions the owner was extremely rude the second time was enough for me. Would not reccomend them to anyone.

name: REDNECK2589 REDNECK
text: Great place to shop

name: Lora Pleasants
text: Best place for boots!

name: Michele Campbell
text: So helpful, and very friendly

name: NANCY HOLLAND SMITH
text: Very nice

name: KEITH GOINS
text: Hats and shirts

name: Robert Richey
text: I’ve bought 2 pairs of Ariats for my son here over the past year and a pair of Dan Posts and Ariats for myself.  The staff has always been polite and helpful.  I’m fairly new to cowboy boots but the staff has been AWESOME about helping me and my son find the right fit every time.  I found a pair of Tony Lama boots online that I liked and went in and they helped me find the right fit which was slightly different than my other boots.  They didn’t have the exact pair I wanted but can order in any boot from brands that they carry so fingers crossed this  Monday I’ll be ordering a new pair of boots after they call the distributor.  I absolutely recommend!!!

name: Benjamin L
text: Great local place to get boots! Very helpful staff.

name: Brandon Kelley
text: Very friendly and helpful staff. Have always had good service and selection.

name: Candace Hodges
text: Terrible experience! Came in to buy a hat and was treated as if I couldn’t afford what I wanted to purchase. They didn’t have what I was looking for and before leaving the store the lady behind the counter(Whom was zero help at all!) rolled her eyes at me when I told her I was going to look elsewhere. It’s sad these days that people are so rude but I will definitely never shop there again!

name: Susan Jude
text: There is always friendly help I have a son in law that shops here from jasper when he is home and all 3 of my boys buy boots here and myself and 2 of my daughters!! My family is very happy to have a western store in our town!!

name: Andrew Waites
text: Staff is unprofessional. Been in several times and I never feel like they care much about helping you.

name: Jacob Brown
text: Literally just left from there the staff greeted me and asked what I was looking for what size and the had boots for me to try on in a matter of minutes.  If your looking for boots to fit just right go here.

name: Jordan Hall
text: Awesome place!!! Cole helped me out big time with finding the exact boots I was looking for and even held them for me for 1hr before I got there on black Friday. Hopefully they will ship to Texas

name: Jay Cox
text: Very nice and helpful staff. Great selection of boots both for work casual wear.

name: Jennifer Williams
text: Went in to get a hat and Cole was super helpful!  He even dug through the winter hats in the back to help me find what I was looking for.   It was an awesome experience and I'll be going back for a pair of boots soon.

name: Heather Rivers
text: One women stood outside smoking the entire time I was in there and then came inside and just stared at me. Terrible service won’t go back.

name: White Wolf
text: Helpfull staff. Great selection of work boots

name: Matt Holden
text: Great service. Had several pictures sent from their sister store so I could see a few pair that weren't in stock. They had those boots in the store by the next morning for me to try on. Happy customer.

name: Emma Strength
text: The sales people were very helpful!

name: C Way
text: They have in stock so many boots. They will special order your size. Great if you have a wide foot. Carry leather wallets and phone holsters.

name: Dexter Martin
text: Well organized store had plenty of  top name brand boots to choose from work and style  cole was very helpful. New pair of Georgia work boots  and hat..Will definitely be back...

name: John Wright
text: Very helpful and the kind of place that really cares!

name: Denise Clark
text: I visited the store to purchase a hat on 7 May. Upon entering the store, the man behind the counter was on the phone. I proceeded to look at the hats ; by this time he ended his call (I was not acknowledged.) I looked in his direction and said "excuse me" to get his attention but, I was ignored. He never turned around to address me! If this is how customer's are treated then you should not be in business!

name: Brandon Pugh
text: You’re return policy is absolutely the worst policy I’ve ever encountered... honestly not surprised can’t wait for y’all too go out of business.

name: Jaime Parmer
text: FANTASTIC customer service with an amazing selection of great boots for all walks of life, work or play...will definitely shop there again!

name: Nicky Nick
text: Very nice people and great service, help me find the boots I wanted.

name: James Boothe
text: Good place

name: Rhonda Pascual
text: Hometown store with polite,helpful staff. Large collection of Western wear from hats to boots,cowboy shirts and jeans for both men and women and even kids. Lots of.pretty dresses ,skirts and blouses too. Some costume jewelry and other neat nothing items. And if they don't have your particular size,they can order it.

name: Harriet Pugh
text: Great place. Really sweet helpful ladies. Found a great pair of boots.

name: Nick Linder
text: Good selection, nice place to shop and buy boots.

name: sonja beasley
text: A very nice store and friendly staff 🙂

name: Cathy Frances
text: The service at Brantley’s is phenomenal! I order from out-of-state and have always been so pleased with everything, from the amazingly kind and very personal service I have received to the quality of merchandise and their quick shipping. Peggy has called and emailed to make sure everything is always taken care of perfectly. This is the way a business should be run. I cannot say enough good things about Brantley’s and I recommend them to everybody looking for square dance/western clothes and dance shoes. Thank you for adding to our joy of square dancing by giving such special customer service!!

name: Carl Esch
text: Mi first time in. The Lady said they had be there for about 20 years. They had a good selection of Western clothing. What I liked was it was not so dang over filled that you rubbed agents other close while looking. The prices was about with all the rest of the western stores around. Yes my wife and I will go back. Yes I recommend it.

text: Great selection of Western apparel and boots.  Very nice place to shop.

name: landa440
text: I was warmly welcomed as soon as I came in. I was looking for a special square toe boot and they helped me find the best fit for the price. They gave me care tips and helpful info on how to weatherproof my boots. I highly recommend them for any clothing or boot needs.

resp.text: Thank you Norma! We strive for excellent customer service!

text: I like to buy boots here because they have a decent selection for Atmore, and fairly reasonable pricing. Also their customer service is great if you have problems with them.

resp.text: Thank you Johnathan!! We really do try to give our customers what they want!!

name: Melissa Lowery
text: Very nice people.

name: Kerry Koehn
text: Great service!!!

name: CJ Sims
text: Had a chance to stop by here on our way back home and really glad that we did. Small local owned shop with super nice people. Truly the best customer service we have had in a long time! Will definately return to buy our next set of work boots. Prices are reasonable and fair and you get the great service for free, which is so rare nowadays it seems! Thank you again for the great service and we enjoyed meeting everyone!

name: Zachary “Z Money” Cardwell
text: Down Home Southern Hospitality at it's finest!

name: Ashley Ogle
text: The Lady that helped me was very helpful I was in in between sizes and she helped me find the perfect boot for me! Highly recommend coming here . A great plus is the prices are very reasonable.

name: Icysnoow S
text: Absolutely love how the lady helped size my foot to some boots she taught me more about boots than I ever have great place

name: Trey Short
text: Great local store to buy boots.

name: Shannon Hewitt
text: Selection may not be  as big as other stores but that doesn't matter.  They make up for it in customer service and prices. Great small town friendly feeling.  In the last few months I have purchased nursing shoes and  flip flops .  I went in tonight wanting a plain comfortable pair of work boots for our farm. They helped me find the perfect fit. The ladies boots were not fitting my plain Jane style and comfort needs . The ladies working helped me find a man's boot that felt like I have already broke them in. They measured  my 4  yo son's foot tonight and he got a new pair of tennis shoes. Buying him shoes was not in my plans but their prices were to great to pass up. I would have bought him a size 12 standard when he needed a 13 wide. My  son loved the fit so much he wanted to wear them out of the store. My husband was in the store for the first time tonight and he got a hat he was very impressed with the customer service. Keep up the great job ladies .I know we will see you again soon.

name: tena gilliland
text: Always a pleasure to take my grandchildren here for shoes.  They actually measure the childs foot (like they did years ago) to make sure the shoe is a perfect fit.  We have always been very satisfied with their personal service and great prices !!

name: Daniel A. Freeman
text:
Great place to get Western wear!
I recommend this highly!
Can't beat pricing!

name: Andrea Bartlett
text: The people that own/work here are awesome. Helped my son find the perfect fit while buying his first pair of boots. Will definitely buy from them again.

name: Katlyn Findley
text: My husband works outside and walks in rough terrain all day. He gets the same pair of boots every year from Roses. We drive over an hour away just to come here because the service is always so great. We would not dream of goi anywhere else. Their prices and service cannot be beat.

name: Howell Gray
text: Great place to buy from,they go above and beyond,just great folks

name: Cheryl Sorensen
text: I looked all over for a pair of Dingo harness boots and found them at Rose's. They made sure I was happy with my fitting. I will be taking the Hubby there for his next pair of boots.

name: Jenny Stiglet
text: Have been twice so far and the staff are so kind and very helpful. It's a small store tho so selection is also small. But then again it's a small town so that's to be expected. Customer service is great tho.

name: Alisha Wetherell
text: We visited for new boots while we were in from out-of-town. Their selection was great and they were so friendly! I’m so glad we stopped in!!

name: Mike McCombs
text: Super friendly people and great price on my Ariat boots will be back for all my boot needs

name: Brittany Skinner
text: Great place for a special size foot. We were in and out in less than 45 minutes. The couple running the store knew exactly what size my husband needed and picked out the perfect boot for him on the first try. Will definitely return!

name: Ryan Tobey
text: My family and I have bought our boots here great place very nice people

name: Anna Duke
text: We love Rose's boots! Great customer service and treats you like family. And not expensive on their shoes.

name: Alycia Diehl
text: Beautiful Boits and hats! The staff and owners are great! I love my new boots!

name: April Miles
text: Great prices on boots,  I am loving mine

name: Mary J
text: Because they have the best comfortable  work boots.I buy them for my husband which is on his feet all day mainly on concrete or u name it .so I try to buy the best boot that gives him support and comfort he needs plus what the work company requires if steel toe or not . I promise you it's. Worth the money. I will always buy my husbands boots there .there the best.

name: Karen Kennedy
text: Great prices and great selection.

name: Jared Gann
text: The salesman was very helpful and came right over to give me a hand on what I was looking for. The pricing was very competitive with other boot stores in the surrounding area

name: George Stanton
text: Great prices and friendly knowledgeable service

name: Anne Sorrell
text: My fiance recently started riding horses and we needed western boots with leather soles. We live in downtown Birmingham so I searched and called dozens of stores, and then several people recommended Rose's. After reading the review that the salesmen were pushy, I was a little nervous but I have never had a better shoe-buying experience. The man helping us was not a bit pushy, just helpful and patient as we each tried on and re tried on while helped us weigh the pros and cons of each. They were having a huge sale and we got great deals, we're really happy with our purchase and equally happy with our buying experience!

name: Helen Adamson
text: Love the boot store thay got a lot of boots

name: ginger crumpton
text: Great shoes, great prices and wonderful owners!!  I go back every month!!

name: Connie Horn
text: Very friendly environment love the experience and the sale prices

name: Ricky Mickle
text: Great people selling great quality boot

name: Tracy Nolen
text: Great place!! We always come back!!!

name: Deborah Gargon
text: They have shoes,Boots but I buy the nurse's  shoes at a great price A great place to Shop

name: Mark Owen
text: Returned shoes cause guy wouldn't hear anything I said. Still havent received money for return by the way

name: Jackie Conn
text: Had great prices....

name: Bobby Hale
text: Good folks. Pretty good selection. And great prices.

name: Bo Elliott
text: Great place to shop. I’ve been doing business with them for over 30 years. I’ve never been disappointed with service or product.

text: I have shoppedal at rose's boot store for over 20 years and I have bought 25 pare boots or more, every visit were most pleasant, I appreciate there hospitality

text: If You are looking for quality at a fair price You will love this store!!!

name: Chase Wright
text: Amazing amazing customer service!! Got in just what I needed and super fast! Very happy customer!!

name: Beatrice Stjohn
text: Not really impressed with the prices . Window says one price for kids but inside says otherwise

name: Curtis White
text: If You are looking for quality at a fair price You will love this store!!!

name: Bama Chic
text: Professional place of business, always very helpful & curtious.

name: Michelle Buzbee
text: Great selection and great customer service

name: Bryan White
text: Great American owned business. Jennifer and Phil ( the owners) have the best attitudes you could ask for. They will help you find what you are looking for without trying to just sell you something to make a sell. They will size you and make sure the boot fits perfectly. From belts,buckles,boots,hats,shoes,clothes and Dusters, you can find what you want. And if you dont, they can get it for you. But know that when you go in, they are there to help you, but not try and force a sale on you. Make sure to tell Jennifer that her man in black sent you. ( and no I dont get paid lol) And Phil knows me as Bryan. Remember, buying American helps Americans. God Bless.

name: David Johnson
text: GREAT FOLK,S GREAT PRICES, GREAT SELECTION, ALWAYS HELPFUL, ONLY PLACE I WILL BUY BOOTS AT, 5 STAR EXPERIENCE EVERY TIME !!!!! SOME VERY NICE DECOR ALSO.

text: Good deals

name: James Kapps
text: Pushy salesmen who just want to force any pair of boots on you, and over priced on a lot of their stuff, Would not go back or recommend to anyone.

name: Wendy Franklin
text: Lots of variety and awesome owners

name: Ett
text: Everything you want Western!!!

name: Kevin Joyner
text: As ethical and true as any of the people I know.

name: Curt Brewer
text: The address is wrong on Google Maps. Rose Shoes & boots is actually located in the Publix shopping center at the corner of old Springville Road and Sweeney hollow.
